TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlElement extends System.Xml.XmlLinkedNode

summary.span: 代表項目。

span.span: Represents an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目是其中一個最常見的節點 W3C 文件物件模型 (DOM) 中。Elements are one of the most common nodes in the W3C Document Object Model (DOM). 項目可以有與其相關聯的屬性。Elements can have attributes associated with them. `XmlElement`類別有許多方法來存取屬性 (， ， ，等等)。The `XmlElement` class has many methods for accessing attributes (, , , , and so on). 您也可以使用屬性會傳回讓您從集合中存取屬性的名稱或索引。You can also use the property which returns an enabling you to access attributes by name or index from the collection.

summary.span: 建立這個節點的複本。

span.span: Creates a duplicate of this node.
The cloned node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可做為節點的複製建構函式。This method serves as a copy constructor for nodes. 重複的節點有沒有父代 (傳回`null`)。The duplicate node has no parent ( returns `null`). ## Examples 下例會建立新的項目、 複製它，並再將這兩個項目加入至 XML 文件。The following example creates a new element, clones it, and then adds both elements into an XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 節點都放置在其中發生的 preorder 周遊中的順序樹狀目錄中。The nodes are placed in the order in which they would be encountered in a preorder traversal of the tree. > [!NOTE] > 建議您改用或方法，而非方法。It is recommended that you use the or method instead of the method. ## Examples 下列範例會取得並顯示所有書籍項目。The following example gets and displays all the book titles. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下列範例會移除根項目中的所有屬性。The following example removes all attributes from the root element. span.span: Gets or sets the concatenated values of the node and all its children.

span.span: The concatenated values of the node and all its children.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性指定字串的已剖析內容取代所有子系。Setting this property replaces all the children with the parsed contents of the given string. 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下列範例會比較`InnerText`和屬性。The following example compares the `InnerText` and properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性指定字串的已剖析內容取代節點的子系。Setting this property replaces the children of the node with the parsed contents of the given string. 剖析會在目前命名空間內容中完成。The parsing is done in the current namespace context. 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下列範例會比較和`InnerXml`屬性。The following example compares the and `InnerXml` properties. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlElement.InnerXml Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsEmpty { get; set; }
.property instance bool IsEmpty
Public Property IsEmpty As Boolean
public: property bool IsEmpty { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定項目的標記格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the tag format of the element.

value.span: 傳回如果項目，則以短標記格式序列化，以"<項目 />";代表長格式"<項目></項目>"。

span.span: Returns if the element is to be serialized in the short tag format "<item/>"; for the long format "<item></item>".

value.span: 設定這個屬性時，如果設定為 ，會移除項目的子系，並且以短標記格式序列化項目。

span.span: When setting this property, if set to , the children of the element are removed and the element is serialized in the short tag format.

value.span: 如果設定為 ，會變更屬性的值 (不論項目是否有內容)；如果項目是空的，將會以長格式序列化。

span.span: If set to , the value of the property is changed (regardless of whether or not the element has content); if the element is empty, it is serialized in the long format.

value.span: 這個屬性是文件物件模型的 Microsoft 擴充功能。

span.span: This property is a Microsoft extension to the Document Object Model (DOM).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是 Microsoft 擴充功能的文件物件模型 (DOM)。This property is a Microsoft extension of the Document Object Model (DOM). ## Examples 下列範例會將內容加入空的項目。The following example adds content to an empty element. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlElement.IsEmpty Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlElement.IsEmpty Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlElement.IsEmpty Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlElement.IsEmpty Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlElement.IsEmpty Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlElement.IsEmpty Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Overridable Sub SetAttribute (name As String, value As String)

param.name: name
param.span: 要建立或變更的屬性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the attribute to create or alter.
This is a qualified name.

param.span: 如果名稱包含冒號，將會剖析為前置詞和區域名稱元件。

span.span: If the name contains a colon it is parsed into prefix and local name components.
The value to set for the attribute.

summary.span: 設定具有指定名稱之屬性的值。

span.span: Sets the value of the attribute with the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果具有相同名稱的屬性已經存在的項目中，其值變更為屬於`value`。If an attribute with the same name is already present in the element, its value is changed to that of `value`. `value` 這是簡單的字串。`value` is a simple string. 它不會剖析為正在設定。It is not parsed as it is being set. 任何標記，例如語法能夠辨識當成實體參考，會被視為常值文字，必須正確逸出，實作時，它會寫出。若要指派包含實體參考的屬性值，使用者必須建立節點以及任何和建置適當的子樹狀結構節點，並使用指派做為屬性的值。Any markup, such as syntax to be recognized as an entity reference, is treated as literal text and needs to be properly escaped by the implementation when it is written out. In order to assign an attribute value that contains entity references, the user must create an node plus any and nodes, build the appropriate subtree and use to assign it as the value of an attribute.

exception.span: 指定的名稱包含無效的字元。

span.span: The specified name contains an invalid character.
The node is read-only.
